resources.string: Player %1$s won the game!\nClick on reset to play again.
The game is tied!\nClick on reset to play again.
The droid won the game!\nClick on reset to play again.

Place three identical icons in a row to win the match! The icons can be in a row vertically, horizontally and diagonally. 
Pressing on the Play button will change the game mode from player vs droid to player vs player, and vice versa. 
Pressing on the Reset button will clear the board to play a new match. 
Pressing on the Scores button will display the tally of scores for the played games. 
Pressing on the Zero button will erase all the scores.
This app was created by Alena Shulzhenko and Erika Bourque, two Dawson College student currently in their third year of studying computer science.
